content: Even though I don't have to work, I'm still pretty busy, climbing mountains, exploring caves, diving into the sea...{短暂停} I'm beat. Let's sit down together, shall we?

content: I run wild through the mountains, but I also enjoy sitting down to enjoy a moment of peace and quiet with a friend. Come and sit next to me!
